mapper.insert: insert into help(name, carinfo_carnum, rx, ry, reason, request_time) values(#{name}, #{carinfo_carnum}, #{rx}, #{ry}, #{reason}, sysdate());
mapper.update: UPDATE help SET supporter_carnum = #{supporter}, state=#{state}, accepted_time = sysdate() WHERE carinfo_carnum = #{carinfo_carnum};
mapper.select: select IF(COUNT(*) = 1, true, false) from booking where reserved_car = #{carnum};

select * from help
carnum like CONCAT('%',#{word},'%')
state like CONCAT('%',#{word},'%')
order by no;
